item.title: Ukraine says 'understanding' reached with US on peace plan, as Trump says his envoy will meet Putin
item.description: President Trump says the original peace plan has been "fine-tuned", and that he will send his envoy Steve Witkoff to Moscow.

item.title: CPS to train staff to spot 'hidden crimes' when investigating domestic abuse
item.description: The CPS says data shows a "growing relationship" between domestic abuse and crimes including rape and stalking.

item.title: Who is Trump's 'drone guy' Dan Driscoll, taking key role in Ukraine talks?
item.description: The youngest-ever US army secretary has been thrust into the spotlight as the face of renewed efforts to end the years-long war.

item.title: The Whole 10 Yards
item.description: What are the driving forces for the NFL's international games and where could be next?

item.title: Farage's racism denials are dishonest, says ex-classmate
item.description: Peter Ettedgui tells the BBC Nigel Farage targeted antisemitic abuse at him when they were teenagers.
